titleStmt.title: The church defended, against Mr. Skingle's assize-sermon at Hertford In a letter to a friend. By a true lover of the orthodox clergie.
titleStmt.author: True lover of the orthodox clergie.

notesStmt.note: In response to Richard Skingle's "Reformation and union recommended, as the present duty and interest of the nation".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
